alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Washington (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 2:43PM CDT until July 16 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Crawford County in east central Missouri... Northwestern Washington County in east central Missouri... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 243 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bourbon, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sullivan, Bourbon, Anthonies Mill, Leasburg, Richwoods, St. Cloud, Latty, and Shirley. This includes Interstate 44 in Missouri near exit 218. This also includes Onondaga Cave State Park and Meramec State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
